languages.text: "Могу. Но не буду". {n}Соломон бесстрашно смотрит вам в глаза.{/n} "Я действительно сожалею, что солгал вам, но... также рад, что лгать больше не придется".
"I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."
languages.original_text: "Могу. Но не буду". {n}Соломон бесстрашно смотрит вам в глаза.{/n} "Я действительно сожалею, что солгал вам, но... также рад, что лгать больше не придется".

traits.locale_text: "I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."
"I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."
"I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."
"I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."
"I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."

languages.text: « Je le pourrais, mais je n'en ferai rien, » {n}répond Solomorne en vous regardant droit dans les yeux sans la moindre hésitation.{/n} « Je suis sincèrement désolé de vous avoir {mf|trompé|trompée}, mais... je suis également soulagé de ne plus avoir à mentir. »
languages.original_text: "I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."

traits.locale_text: « Je le pourrais, mais je n'en ferai rien, » {n}répond Solomorne en vous regardant droit dans les yeux sans la moindre hésitation.{/n} « Je suis sincèrement désolé de vous avoir {mf|trompé|trompée}, mais... je suis également soulagé de ne plus avoir à mentir. »

languages.text: 「そうできますよ。でもしません」{n}ソロモーンは恐れることなくあなたの目を見つめた。{/n}「あなたに嘘をついたことは心から申しわけなく思っています。ですが…もう嘘をつかなくていいことに、正直ほっとしているんです」
languages.original_text: "I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."

traits.locale_text: 「そうできますよ。でもしません」{n}ソロモーンは恐れることなくあなたの目を見つめた。{/n}「あなたに嘘をついたことは心から申しわけなく思っています。ですが…もう嘘をつかなくていいことに、正直ほっとしているんです」

languages.text: «Podría. Pero no lo haré». {n}Solomorne te mira sin temor a los ojos.{/n} «Lamento sinceramente haberle mentido, pero... a la vez me siento aliviado por no tener que mentirle más».
languages.original_text: "I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."

traits.locale_text: «Podría. Pero no lo haré». {n}Solomorne te mira sin temor a los ojos.{/n} «Lamento sinceramente haberle mentido, pero... a la vez me siento aliviado por no tener que mentirle más».

languages.text: “我可以，但我不会这么做。”{n}索罗蒙无所畏惧地直视着你的目光。{/n}“我骗了你，我真的很抱歉，不过……我也松了口气，因为我再也不用说谎了。”
languages.original_text: "I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."

traits.locale_text: “我可以，但我不会这么做。”{n}索罗蒙无所畏惧地直视着你的目光。{/n}“我骗了你，我真的很抱歉，不过……我也松了口气，因为我再也不用说谎了。”

languages.text: "Evet ama almayacağım. {n}Solomorne, korkusuzca gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Yalan söylediğim için çok özür dilerim ama artık yalan söylemek zorunda olmadığım için içim rahat."
languages.original_text: "I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Evet ama almayacağım. {n}Solomorne, korkusuzca gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Yalan söylediğim için çok özür dilerim ama artık yalan söylemek zorunda olmadığım için içim rahat."

languages.text: "Das könnte ich. Ich werde es aber nicht tun." {n}Solomorne sieht dir furchtlos in die Augen.{/n} "Es tut mir aufrichtig leid, Euch belogen zu haben, aber ... Ich bin auch erleichtert, nun nicht mehr lügen zu müssen."
languages.original_text: "I could. But I won't." {n}Solomorne looks fearlessly into your eyes.{/n} "I am truly sorry I lied to you, but... I'm also relieved I don't have to lie anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Das könnte ich. Ich werde es aber nicht tun." {n}Solomorne sieht dir furchtlos in die Augen.{/n} "Es tut mir aufrichtig leid, Euch belogen zu haben, aber ... Ich bin auch erleichtert, nun nicht mehr lügen zu müssen."
